org.gvsig.quickInfo.tools
Class QuickInfoListener

java.lang.Object
  org.gvsig.quickInfo.tools.QuickInfoListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.tools.Listeners.PointListener, com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.tools.Listeners.ToolListener
public class QuickInfoListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.tools.Listeners.PointListener

Tool listener that updates MapControl's tool tip with the information selected that the cursor of the mouse points on MapControl.

This tool only apply changes when a single point is indicated.

Author:
Vicente Caballero Navarro (vicente.caballero@iver.es), Jaume Domínguez Faus (jaume.dominguez@iver.es), César Martínez Izquierdo (cesar.martinez@iver.es), Pablo Piqueras Bartolomé (pablo.piqueras@iver.es)

Constructor Detail

QuickInfoListener

public QuickInfoListener(com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.MapControl mc,
                         QuickInfoFLayerSelected infoSelected,
                         int pixel_tolerance)

Creates a new QuickInfoListener. Tool that gets the previously selected alfanumeric information of a feature identified by a point, and displays it formatted in a MapControl's tool tip text.

Parameters:
mc - a MapControl instance
infoSelected - the information to display
pixel_tolerance - pixel tolerance (should be greater in points)

Gets the number of events that will ignore.

This is very useful to accelerate the this tool when the layer is being edited.

the number of events that will ignore
